attributes.action: Gyms to remain open during national lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Because fitness centres are vital in maintaining public health and well being. They also play a huge part in relieving the stress on the NHS as without them, other conditions will worsen and result in medical attention. Gyms have not been proven to be a breeding ground for COVID and they have all adopted strict measurements to enable safe operation. It defeats the object allowing everyone else to work hand in hand together, but forcing fitness centres to close.
attributes.background: Allow gyms and fitness centres to remain open following the guidelines which they have already put in place. Without this, this winter will face a massive increase in depression/ even possible suicide and more.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
